name: Grim Reaper Sim
description:
This was made for the Nokia 3310 2 Game Jam, also my second game jam.

You, an accountant, work for a company that kill's people when their time has come (I mean, that's what grim reapers do right?). Today, the staff is short handed so boss needs you to take care of a client that's a bit eccentric for him. To make the client accept death, you must bring them 3 objects that bring them happiness. Good luck.
